text: job title, keywords or company city or state Jacobs 1,589 reviews - Pune, Maharashtra As a clean water modeller you will be working on clean water network projects as part of Jacobs Utilities business unit. Responsibilities will include: Driving health and safety through everything we Carrying out modelling functions safely and to the appropriate level of completion and quality Clean water network modelling for Jacobs to support our project teams for clients within the UK Working within the modelling team to complete scopes of work to quality standards within Qualifications Flexibility in terms of travel (UK and international) Site visits and meetings as required At Jacobs, we help prepare people for new opportunities and challenges. With positions at every level, openings in multiple disciplines, expertise in a range of markets and offices around the globe, we create an environment where you can learn, grow, and thrive. From our competitive benefits program to our Health and Safety initiative of Beyond Zero workplace injuries, we believe that you'll find a flourishing career here at Jacobs. JACOBS is an equal opportunities employer and is committed to the safety and well-being of all.
